insomnia.name: dpop-header-adder
insomnia.description: This plugin automatically generates a dpop token and adds it as DPoP header if the header 'DPoP' is set to any dummy value. PrivateKey and PublicKey also have to be provided base64 encoded either in a environmentvariable 'DPoPPublicKey' / 'DPoPPrivateKey' as header. These are not sent with the request
